label: 陰陽師
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: An expert in yin-yang lore, connected with the Yin-Yang Office (Onmyō Ryō), an organ of the Bureau of Central Affairs in charge of matters pertaining to astrology, weather, the calendar, timekeeping, and divination.[陰陽寮][RK]
